q: Welch explained the date change Vermont seeks to enable a swifter move toward a singlepayer system meshes with flexibility conservative politicians might also like because of their opposition to federal control of health care. My argument to them is why not let states experiment? So it is a state's rights argument, Welch said. Sen. Bernie Sanders added that the date change wouldn't cost the federal government anything extra, doesn't mention the word singlepayer but would hold states to all the requirements of the law.

Egypt recognises and appreciates the care and effort undertaken by the government of Germany to preserve and display the painted limestone bust of Queen Nefertiti, Zahi Hawass said in a statement.
